name: Drowned Memories
storyline:
he story follows Gil, from the northeast region, that became a construction worker that quickly a community leader.

Gil was one of the first on Vila Amaury, helping many to get a place to live. When he discovers that the village will be drowned by the waters of the artificial lake Paranoá, he feels that is his responsibility to warn everyone and try to find a solution for his neighbors.
summary: Drowned Memories is an upcoming narrative-driven game taking place in the late 1950s, when the federal capital of Brazil, Brasília, was being built. Based on real events, the game tells the story of one of the largest workers' villages called Amaury Village, which was flooded by the waters of the artificial lake Paranoá.
